metadata.title: CVE-2023-4232 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in ofono, an Open Source Telephony on Linux. A stackoverflow bug is triggered within the decode_status_report() function duringthe SMS decoding. It is assumed that the attack scenario is accessible froma compromised modem, a malicious base station, or just SMS. There is abound check for this memcpy length in decode_submit(), but it was forgottenin decode_status_report().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ofono - 1.31-3ubuntu1.2
ofono-scripts - 1.31-3ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ofono package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.31-3ubuntu1.2').
